88.5 % accuracy.from sentence: DR - BiLSTM ( Single ) achieves 88.5 % accuracy on the test set which is noticeably the best reported result among the existing single models for this task .

DR - BiLSTM ( Ensemble ).from sentence: DR - BiLSTM ( Ensemble ) achieves the accuracy of 89.3 % , the best result observed on SNLI , while DR - BiLSTM ( Single ) obtains the accuracy of 88.5 % , which considerably outperforms the previous non-ensemble models .

ensemble model.from sentence: Our ensemble model considerably outperforms the current state - of - the - art by obtaining 89.3 % accuracy .

preprocessing mechanism.from sentence: We can see that our preprocessing mechanism leads to further improvements of 0.4 % and 0.3 % on the SNLI test set for our single and ensemble models respectively .

our single model.name: DR - BiLSTM ( Single ) + Process
our single model.from sentence: In fact , our single model ( " DR - BiLSTM ( Single ) + Process " ) obtains the state - of - the - art performance over both reported single and ensemble models by performing a simple preprocessing step .

DR - BiLSTM ( Ensem . ) + Process.from sentence: Furthermore , " DR - BiLSTM ( Ensem . ) + Process " outperforms the existing state - of - the - art remarkably ( 0.7 % improvement ) .

further improvements.for: single and ensemble DR - BiLSTM models

trivial preprocessing step.from sentence: Also , utilizing a trivial preprocessing step yields to further improvements of 0.4 % and 0.3 % for single and ensemble DR - BiLSTM models respectively .
